item.title: Rystad因关税和价格下跌下调美国页岩油增长预期
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全球贸易战导致大宗商品价格下跌和成本上升的情况下，石油行业咨询公司 Rystad Energy 将其对今年美国陆上原油增长的预期下调了一半以上。【原文：Oil industry consultant Rystad Energy has slashed its estimate for US onshore crude growth by more than half for this year, amid lower commodity prices and higher costs brought on by President Donald Trump’s global trade war.】

item.title: 德意志银行称美国资产面临外国 "买家打击
item.description: 据德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）称，尽管上周市场有所复苏，但外国投资者 "仍在对美国资产进行买方出击"。【原文：Despite the market recovery of the past week, foreign investors “remain on a buyers’ strike on US assets,” according to Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: UPS 正与初创公司 Figure AI 洽谈部署仿人机器人事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service Inc.【原文：United Parcel Service Inc. is in talks with robotics startup Figure AI Inc. to use humanoid robots for some tasks in the logistics giant’s network, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国将季度净借款预期上调至 5140 亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部提高了对本季度联邦借贷的估计，以考虑到比其预测少得多的起始现金储备—；这是国会至今未能提高联邦债务限额的结果。【原文：The US Treasury ramped up its estimate for federal borrowing for the current quarter to account for a much smaller starting stockpile of cash than it had projected — a consequence of Congress having failed as yet to raise the federal debt limit.】

item.title: OpenAI 让用户通过 ChatGPT 购物，向谷歌发起挑战
item.description: OpenAI 现在可以让用户在 ChatGPT 中选购商品，这是这家人工智能初创公司为扩大其流行聊天机器人的覆盖范围并挑战谷歌等竞争对手而采取的最新举措。【原文：OpenAI now lets users shop for products within ChatGPT, the latest move by the artificial intelligence startup to expand the reach of its popular chatbot and challenge rivals like Google.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦部长警告与印度爆发战争的 "直接威胁
item.description: 上周克什米尔北部地区发生激进分子袭击事件，造成 26 人死亡，紧张局势加剧，巴基斯坦国防部长警告说有可能与印度开战，但表示战争是可以避免的。【原文：Pakistan’s defense minister warned of the possibility of war with India but said it can be averted, as tensions rise over last week’s militant attacks in the northern region of Kashmir that killed 26 people.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州娱乐业激进分子批评董事会裁员，坚持抗争
item.description: 寻求改变赌场运营商宾夕法尼亚娱乐公司（Penn Entertainment Inc.【原文：HG Vora Capital Management, an activist investor seeking changes at casino operator Penn Entertainment Inc., criticized the company for reducing the number of board seats up for election and said it will continue a proxy fight.】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆的支持率超过阿姆洛，助长墨西哥经济乐观情绪
item.description: 尽管存在经济衰退的风险和美国贸易战的危险，但墨西哥人对总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆的钦佩甚至超过了她广受欢迎的前任安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔，这种地位正在助长经济乐观情绪。【原文：President Claudia Sheinbaum is more admired by Mexicans than even her popular predecessor Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador, a status that is fueling economic optimism despite risks of a recession and the perils of a US trade war.】

item.title: 美元暴跌引发避险需求，日元和法郎上涨 1
item.description: 由于投资者在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政策下抛售美国资产— 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）预计这一趋势将持续下去，美元周一的下跌帮助支撑了海外货币，包括日元和瑞士法郎等避险货币。【原文：A drop in the US dollar on Monday helped support overseas currencies, including havens like the Japanese yen and Swiss franc, as investors sell US assets under Donald Trump’s policies — a trend that JPMorgan Chase & Co. expects to continue.】

item.title: 关税 "混乱 "拖累得克萨斯州主要制造业指标跌至 2020 年以来最差水平
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行的一份报告显示，由于企业高管们用 "混乱 "和 "疯狂 "等词来形容唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策所引发的动荡，一项广受关注的德克萨斯州制造业活动指标明显减弱。【原文：A widely followed measure of Texas manufacturing activity weakened significantly as executives used words like “chaos” and “insanity” to describe the turmoil spurred by President Donald Trump’s tariffs, according to a report by the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 拉加德在工会调查中没有赢得心怀不满的欧洲央行员工的支持
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）正在努力争取员工的支持，这些员工说他们对该机构的最高管理层缺乏信心。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde is struggling to win over staff who say they have little faith in the institution’s top management.】

item.title: 华盛顿州针对科技巨头增税致富
item.description: 在华盛顿州立法会议的最后几天通过的新税种旨在通过将更多的税收负担转嫁给亚马逊公司和微软公司等科技公司来弥补创纪录的预算赤字。【原文：New taxes passed in the final days of Washington’s legislative session seek to bridge a record budget deficit by shifting more of the tax burden to technology companies like Amazon.com and Microsoft Corp.】

item.title: 巴拿马寻求美国合作，但不在贸易战中偏袒任何一方
item.description: 巴拿马财政部长表示，巴拿马期待与美国开展更多合作，但避免在世界两大经济体之间的贸易战中偏袒任何一方。【原文：Panama expects more cooperation with the US but is avoiding taking sides in a trade war between the world’s two largest economies, according to its finance chief.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易员转而看好美国股市，但警告称痛苦即将来临
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的交易柜台转而战术性地看涨美国股市，预测包括大科技公司财报和贸易协议公告在内的利好因素将在近期股市溃败后继续提振股市。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s trading desk is turning tactically bullish on US equities, predicting that tailwinds including Big Tech earnings and trade deal announcements will continue to lift stocks after the recent rout.】

item.title: 凯雷接近出售与凯斯-乌尔班和凯蒂-佩里音乐版权相关的债券
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is nearing a $464 million sale of bonds backed by music rights for artists including Katy Perry, Keith Urban and Benny Blanco, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国气象局面临失去数据网络和互联网服务的风险
item.description: 一份支持美国国家海洋和大气管理局网络服务供应商的关键合同将于本周失效，这将威胁到该机构大部分部门在全国范围内的互联网接入和内部数据传输。【原文：A key contract that supports the network service provider for the US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is set to lapse this week, threatening internet access and the transmission of internal data nationwide for much of the agency.】

item.title: 马斯克 "超级粉丝 "以 1100 亿美元投资德州市场 MercadoLibre
item.description: 拉丁美洲最有价值的公司 MercadoLibre Inc. 正要求股东批准一项计划，将其注册地从特拉华州迁往得克萨斯州。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc., Latin America’s most valuable company, is asking shareholders to approve a plan to move its domicile to Texas from Delaware amid a wave of firms reconsidering the long-standing corporate haven after a public spat between a judge and Elon Musk.】

item.title: 银湖公司和 P2 公司考虑以超过 50 亿美元的价格出售黑鹰网络公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，银湖管理公司（Silver Lake Management）和 P2 Capital Partners 正在探讨出售 Blackhawk Network 的可能性，希望为这家预付礼品卡供应商寻求超过 50 亿美元的收购。【原文：Silver Lake Management and P2 Capital Partners are exploring a potential sale of Blackhawk Network, seeking more than $5 billion for the prepaid gift card provider, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: DNA 隐私问题缠身，23andMe 破产申请截止日期延长
item.description: 破产的 DNA 数据银行 23andMe 的出售正面临拖延，因为该公司正试图找到一个能够快速通过监管障碍并保证遵守客户隐私规定的主要竞标者。【原文：The sale of the bankrupt DNA data bank 23andMe is facing delays as the company tries to find a lead bidder that can quickly clear regulatory hurdles and guarantee customer privacy rules will be honored.】

item.title: 欧洲应对俄罗斯威胁，全球军费开支激增
item.description: 周一公布的数据显示，去年国防开支激增，创下了至少自冷战结束以来的最高纪录，欧洲国家急于加强本国安全，以应对来自俄罗斯的威胁。【原文：Defense spending surged last year by the most since at least the end of the Cold War, according to data published Monday, with European countries rushing to bolster their security in the face of threats from Russia.】

item.title: 内幕交易者被判入狱，美国证券交易委员会重新考虑抓捕他的工具
item.description: 俄勒冈州的一名退休人员因与 Nuveen LLC 公司的一名交易员合谋实施了一项价值 4700 万美元的内幕交易计划而被判入狱一年；特朗普政府正在考虑对这起案件进行整顿，而美国证券交易委员会（SEC）的一个有争议的追踪工具就曾对这起案件进行过标记。【原文：An Oregon retiree was ordered to spend a year behind bars for conspiring with a Nuveen LLC trader in a $47 million insider trading scheme — a case flagged by a controversial SEC tracking tool the Trump administration is considering reining in.】

item.title: 美国制裁三艘据称与伊朗支持的胡塞武装有关的船只
item.description: 美国正在对涉嫌向胡塞武装运送精炼石油产品的三艘船只实施制裁，这表明美国在与伊朗就德黑兰核计划进行谈判的过程中持续施压。【原文：The US is imposing sanctions on three vessels for allegedly delivering refined petroleum products to the Houthis, a sign of continued US pressure as it negotiates with Iran about Tehran’s nuclear program.】

item.title: 特朗普环保局批准夏季销售高乙醇 E15 汽油
item.description: 特朗普政府宣布允许今年夏天在全国范围内销售含乙醇更高的 E15 汽油，并称此举将使汽油价格保持低位，并支持美国农业。【原文：The Trump administration announced it is allowing nationwide sales of higher-ethanol E15 gasoline this summer, a move it said would would keep gasoline prices low and support US agriculture.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普制造贸易混乱，南非和肯尼亚仍是私募股权投资的亮点
item.description: 据非洲私人资本协会（African Private Capital Association）称，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的混乱局面搅乱了非洲大陆2025年的筹资前景，但大多数私募股权投资者仍将南非和肯尼亚视为未来三年的首选投资目的地。【原文：A majority of private equity investors see South Africa and Kenya as their top investment destinations over the next three years even as US President Donald Trump’s tariff chaos muddies fund-raising outlook for the continent in 2025, according to the African Private Capital Association.】

item.title: 氢气制造商 Plug Power 因 5.25 亿美元债务交易股价飙升
item.description: Plug Power 公司股价创下近一年来最大涨幅，此前这家氢能公司宣布获得 5.25 亿美元的有担保债务融资，并表示不打算在 2025 年筹集更多资金，其公布的第一季度初步业绩也符合分析师的预期。【原文：Plug Power Inc. shares jumped the most in nearly a year after the hydrogen company announced a $525 million secured debt facility, said it doesn’t plan to raise more equity in 2025 and reported preliminary first-quarter results in line with analysts’ estimates.】

item.title: 萨克斯寻求向债权人保证货架上已备足货品
item.description: 萨克斯全球企业（Saks Global Enterprises）向债权人表示，该公司在 2 月份制定了一项计划，在一年多的时间里逐步向供应商支付逾期欠款，此后供应商的问题有所缓解，库存也有所增加。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises told creditors its vendor troubles have eased and inventory is up after it instituted a plan in February to gradually pay suppliers past due balances over the course of more than a year.】

item.title: 经济形势日趋紧张，贝森特与美国共和党就税收问题僵持不下
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）和国会共和党人将在未来几周内举行会议，为通过数万亿美元的减税计划勾画蓝图，因为民意调查显示，选民大多不赞成白宫对经济的处理。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and congressional Republicans will meet to sketch out the plan for passing a multi-trillion tax cut in the coming weeks as polling shows that voters largely disapprove of the White House’s handling of the economy.】

item.title: 保加利亚将出售 40 亿欧元，这是其最大一笔欧元债务
item.description: 保加利亚正在出售总额 40 亿欧元（45 亿美元）的债券，这是其有史以来单日出售欧元计价债务最多的一次，目的是为其不断增长的预算赤字提供资金，为采用欧元做准备。【原文：Bulgaria is selling a total of €4 billion ($4.5 billion) in bonds, its biggest ever haul of euro-denominated debt in a single day, to fund its growing budget deficit in preparation for euro adoption.】

item.description:

item.title: 索尼考虑推出丹-勒布多年前呼吁的芯片分拆产品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，索尼集团公司正在考虑分拆其半导体部门，这标志着这家 PlayStation 制造商为精简业务、专注于娱乐而做出的最新努力。【原文：Sony Group Corp. is considering spinning off its semiconductor unit, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the PlayStation maker’s latest effort to streamline its business and focus on entertainment.】
